channel.title: SSRSC gets a big upgrade
channel.description:
As you all know SSRSC is silabscape server well now im changing that ssrsc is now not just going too be for silabscape rs2 its gonna be for silabscape rsc and calscape so please check out the changes also if anyone can help i need a rs2 client with the ability for you too select the port sense silabscape runs on a different port than calscape[br][size=1]Posted at: March 15, 2006, 11:06:06 pm[/size][hr]I finally got the solution too the muti world problem1!!!!!!!
everyone visit ssrsc.no-ip.org register for the game they want too connect too and their it displays server status and what the ip is for that world for its
ssw1.no-ip.opg = silabscape ssw2.no-ip.org = calscape ssw3.no-ip.org = silabscape rsc [br][size=1]Posted at: March 16, 2006, 02:09:44 pm[/size][hr]nevermind that dosnt work either because the client is still added the default port at the end what i need is a client that dosnt add the port

item.title: SSRSC gets a big upgrade
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

As you all know SSRSC is silabscape server well now im changing that ssrsc is now not just going too be for silabscape rs2 its gonna be for silabscape rsc and calscape so please check out the changes also if anyone can help i need a rs2 client with the ability for you too select the port sense silabscape runs on a different port than calscape[br][size=1]Posted at: March 15, 2006, 11:06:06 pm[/size][hr]I finally got the solution too the muti world problem1!!!

everyone visit ssrsc.no-ip.org register for the game they want too connect too and their it displays server status and what the ip is for that world for its

ssw1.no-ip.opg = silabscape
ssw2.no-ip.org = calscape
ssw3.no-ip.org = silabscape rsc
[br][size=1]Posted at: March 16, 2006, 02:09:44 pm[/size][hr]nevermind that dosnt work either because the client is still added the default port at the end what i need is a client that dosnt add the port
